front.title: Application Bridging for Federated Access Beyond web (ABFAB) Use Cases

abstract.t: Federated authentication has so far been typically associated with Web-based services, but there is growing interest in the application of federated authentication for non-Web services. The goal of this document is to document a selection of the wide variety of contexts whose user experience could be improved through the use of technologies based on the ABFAB architecture and specifications.
